extendedInfo.description: Stock market prediction and analysis software that works.by 7 Grams Software - fresh java for your phoneAnalyses stock market historical and live data to locate under and over priced stocks, then applies a proven algorithm using popular and custom technical indicators to predict direction of price movements, with an accuracy factor.  Data can be used effectively for short term profits, especially when investing in derivatives (options and futures).First run may be slow while initial data is downloaded.

reviews.title: Too limited to be useful
reviews.comment: Can\'t edit watch list. I like the concept and will keep the app in hopes that it will incorporate customization soon.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fixed FC. Good response, great app. Very good place to start researching stocks. Thanks for an interesting app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: First run slow, but aftervthat gives very interesting information. Can\'t wait for pro version.
reviews.author: A Google User
